at it will auto generate some test cases based values flagged by

result - True*/

> given a comment like the above will generate asser=

There are several great commer=
cial tools that do automated test case
creation. Feel free to experiment wi=
th testgen4j which is an open
source project we created that builds on some=
 other open source tools
(http://developer.spikesource.com/wiki/index.php/P=
rojects:TestGen4J).

After a while its the management and maintenance of th=
e test data that
becomes more of a challenge!
